Translations.Text: neohui gaunde du muliga bul anhae hal ttae hananim-eun geudeul-ui boho jaga doesieossnani midneun salamdeul-eun geudeul jasindeul-eul hananimkke witaghanola
hananim-eun badeuleu jeontueseo neohuiga sosu-indedo seunglitolog hayeoss nola geuleom-eulo hananim-eul dulyeowoha go gamsahala
neohui donglyodeul-ege malhan geos-eulsang-gihala neoui junimkkeseo samcheonmyeong-ui cheonsadeul-eul bonae neohuideul-eul seunglike haessdeon geos-i neohuiege heubjogchi anhdeo nyo
ileohdeus neohuiga innaehago jeong-uie sandamyeon jeog-i gabjagi neohuileul gong-gyeoghadeolado neoui junimkkeseoneun o cheonmyeong-ui cheonsadeul-eul bonaeeo geudeul-eul jeabhalila

geulihayeo hananim-eun neohuileul wihae bog-eum-eul junbihasyeoss-euni ilo inhayeo neohui ma-eum-eul pyeong-anke hala seunglineun hananim-eulobuteoman onani geubun-eun gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasim-i la
hananim-eun bulsinjadeul-ui muli leul myeolhasigeona geudeul-eul jeabhago geudeul-eul jwajeolke hayeo dol-agadolog hanila
hananim-i geudeul-ege gwan-yong-eul bepulgeona beol-eul juneun geos-eun geudaee gwanhan il-i animyeo geudeul-ui joeag-eu lo inhan geos-ila
cheonjiui modeun geos-i hananim-ege gwisoghayeo iss-eumyeo geubun-ui tteus-e ttala gwan-yong-eul bepulgeona geubun-ui tteus e ttala beol-i issnani hananim-eun gwan yong-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
midneun sin-ang-indeul-iyeo ijaleul geodeubhayeo samkiji malla geuligo ha nanim-eul dulyeowo hala geuleomyeon neohui ga beonseonghalila
buljiog-eul dulyeowo hala ineunbulsinjadeul-eul wihae junbidoen geos-inila
hananimkke bogjonghago seonjija leul ttaleula geulihamyeon neohuiga eunhye leul bad-eula
